New Records: The Milwaukee Brewers improved to 6-5 in extra-inning games.
The Cincinnati Reds dropped to 3-4 in extra-inning games.
Key Match Events: Brice Turang had a bunt single that moved Eric Haase to third against Alexis Diaz.
Devin Williams made a game-saving play and earned his seventh save in eight tries.
Trevor Megill pitched a scoreless ninth to post the win.
Pre-Game Insights: Cincinnati scored in the first inning against Colin Rea.
Willie Adames homered off Nick Martinez leading off the second inning for the Brewers.
Santiago Espinal hit his ninth home run of the season for the Reds in the bottom of the second.
Post-Match Reflections: Wade Miley began throwing and was seeing Dr. Timothy Kremchek in Cincinnati to assess his progress.
Hunter Greene reduced pain from a contusion on his right elbow and began throwing.
Miscellaneous Highlights: TJ Friedl had a game-winning hit on Thursday and extended his streak to 910 at bats without hitting into a double play.
Rhett Lowder was set to make his Major League debut in the second game of the doubleheader.
Others: The Brewers improved to 6-5 in extra-inning games. The Reds dropped to 3-4.
Turnning Points: The Reds closer had two consecutive blown saves in his last two appearances.
Outstanding Performances: Devin Williams has retired 24 straight Reds batters dating back to 2022.
Milestones or Significant Achievements: Willie Adames homered off Nick Martinez leading off the second inning for the Brewers.
Santiago Espinal hit his ninth home run of the season for the Reds in the bottom of the second.
Anticipated Key Player Matchups or Rival: The showdown between the Brewers and Reds was highly anticipated.
Notable Head-to-Head Statistics or Uniqu: This was the 100th meeting between the two teams.
Weather or Field Conditions Affecting th: Rain delays led to the game being postponed until the next day.
Historical Comparisons or Records Beyond: The team ended a 20-year championship drought.
Emotional Reactions from Players or Mana: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win.
Reflections on Team Journeys or Tourname: The coach highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push.
Announcements Such as Player Retirements: Albert Pujols announced his retirement at the end of the season.
